00056 /* gps transformed to LTP-NED  */
00057 struct LtpDef_i  ins_ltp_def;
00058          bool_t  ins_ltp_initialised;
00059 struct NedCoor_i ins_gps_pos_cm_ned;
00060 struct NedCoor_i ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned;
00061 #ifdef USE_HFF
00062 /* horizontal gps transformed to NED in meters as float */
00063 struct FloatVect2 ins_gps_pos_m_ned;
00064 struct FloatVect2 ins_gps_speed_m_s_ned;
00065 #endif
00066 bool_t ins_hf_realign;

00068 /* barometer                   */
00069 #ifdef USE_VFF
00070 int32_t ins_qfe;
00071 bool_t  ins_baro_initialised;
00072 int32_t ins_baro_alt;
00073 #ifdef USE_SONAR
00074 bool_t  ins_update_on_agl;
00075 int32_t ins_sonar_offset;
00076 #endif
00077 #endif
00078 bool_t  ins_vf_realign;

00080 /* output                      */
00081 struct NedCoor_i ins_ltp_pos;
00082 struct NedCoor_i ins_ltp_speed;
00083 struct NedCoor_i ins_ltp_accel;

00086 struct EnuCoor_i ins_enu_accel;

00088 
00089 void ins_init() {
00090 #ifdef USE_INS_NAV_INIT
00091   ins_ltp_initialised = TRUE;
00092 
00094   struct LlaCoor_i llh_nav0; /* Height above the ellipsoid */
00095   llh_nav0.lat = INT32_RAD_OF_DEG(NAV_LAT0);
00096   llh_nav0.lon = INT32_RAD_OF_DEG(NAV_LON0);
00097   /* NAV_ALT0 = ground alt above msl, NAV_MSL0 = geoid-height (msl) over ellipsoid */
00098   llh_nav0.alt = NAV_ALT0 + NAV_MSL0;
00099 
00100   struct EcefCoor_i ecef_nav0;
00101   ecef_of_lla_i(&ecef_nav0, &llh_nav0);
00102 
00103   ltp_def_from_ecef_i(&ins_ltp_def, &ecef_nav0);
00104   ins_ltp_def.hmsl = NAV_ALT0;
00105 #else
00106   ins_ltp_initialised  = FALSE;
00107 #endif
00108 #ifdef USE_VFF
00109   ins_baro_initialised = FALSE;
00110 #ifdef BOOZ2_SONAR
00111   ins_update_on_agl = FALSE;
00112 #endif
00113   vff_init(0., 0., 0.);
00114 #endif
00115   ins_vf_realign = FALSE;
00116   ins_hf_realign = FALSE;
00117 #ifdef USE_HFF
00118   b2_hff_init(0., 0., 0., 0.);
00119 #endif
00120   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_ltp_pos);
00121   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_ltp_speed);
00122   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_ltp_accel);
00123   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_enu_pos);
00124   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_enu_speed);
00125   INT32_VECT3_ZERO(ins_enu_accel);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void ins_periodic( void ) {
00129 }

00131 #ifdef USE_HFF
00132 void ins_realign_h(struct FloatVect2 pos, struct FloatVect2 speed) {
00133   b2_hff_realign(pos, speed);
00134 }
00135 #else
00136 void ins_realign_h(struct FloatVect2 pos __attribute__ ((unused)), struct FloatVect2 speed __attribute__ ((unused))) {}
00137 #endif /* USE_HFF */

00139 
00140 void ins_realign_v(float z) {
00141 #ifdef USE_VFF
00142   vff_realign(z);
00143 #endif
00144 }
00145 
00146 void ins_propagate() {
00147   /* untilt accels */
00148   struct Int32Vect3 accel_body;
00149   INT32_RMAT_TRANSP_VMULT(accel_body, imu.body_to_imu_rmat, imu.accel);
00150   struct Int32Vect3 accel_ltp;
00151   INT32_RMAT_TRANSP_VMULT(accel_ltp, ahrs.ltp_to_body_rmat, accel_body);
00152   float z_accel_float = ACCEL_FLOAT_OF_BFP(accel_ltp.z);
00153 
00154 #ifdef USE_VFF
00155   if (baro.status == BS_RUNNING && ins_baro_initialised) {
00156     vff_propagate(z_accel_float);
00157     ins_ltp_accel.z = ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_zdotdot);
00158     ins_ltp_speed.z = SPEED_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_zdot);
00159     ins_ltp_pos.z   = POS_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_z);
00160   }
00161   else { // feed accel from the sensors
00162     ins_ltp_accel.z = ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(z_accel_float);
00163   }
00164 #else
00165   ins_ltp_accel.z = ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(z_accel_float);
00166 #endif /* USE_VFF */
00167 
00168 #ifdef USE_HFF
00169   /* propagate horizontal filter */
00170   b2_hff_propagate();
00171 #else
00172   ins_ltp_accel.x = accel_ltp.x;
00173   ins_ltp_accel.y = accel_ltp.y;
00174 #endif /* USE_HFF */
00175 
00176   INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_pos, ins_ltp_pos);
00177   INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_speed, ins_ltp_speed);
00178   INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_accel, ins_ltp_accel);
00179 }
00180 
00181 void ins_update_baro() {
00182 #ifdef USE_VFF
00183   if (baro.status == BS_RUNNING) {
00184     if (!ins_baro_initialised) {
00185       ins_qfe = baro.absolute;
00186       ins_baro_initialised = TRUE;
00187     }
00188     ins_baro_alt = ((baro.absolute - ins_qfe) * INS_BARO_SENS_NUM)/INS_BARO_SENS_DEN;
00189     float alt_float = POS_FLOAT_OF_BFP(ins_baro_alt);
00190     if (ins_vf_realign) {
00191       ins_vf_realign = FALSE;
00192       ins_qfe = baro.absolute;
00193 #ifdef USE_SONAR
00194       ins_sonar_offset = sonar_meas;
00195 #endif
00196       vff_realign(0.);
00197       ins_ltp_accel.z = ACCEL_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_zdotdot);
00198       ins_ltp_speed.z = SPEED_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_zdot);
00199       ins_ltp_pos.z   = POS_BFP_OF_REAL(vff_z);
00200       ins_enu_pos.z = -ins_ltp_pos.z;
00201       ins_enu_speed.z = -ins_ltp_speed.z;
00202       ins_enu_accel.z = -ins_ltp_accel.z;
00203     }
00204     vff_update(alt_float);
00205   }
00206 #endif
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 void ins_update_gps(void) {
00211 #ifdef USE_GPS
00212   if (gps.fix == GPS_FIX_3D) {
00213     if (!ins_ltp_initialised) {
00214       ltp_def_from_ecef_i(&ins_ltp_def, &gps.ecef_pos);
00215       ins_ltp_def.lla.alt = gps.lla_pos.alt;
00216       ins_ltp_def.hmsl = gps.hmsl;
00217       ins_ltp_initialised = TRUE;
00218     }
00219     ned_of_ecef_point_i(&ins_gps_pos_cm_ned, &ins_ltp_def, &gps.ecef_pos);
00220     ned_of_ecef_vect_i(&ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned, &ins_ltp_def, &gps.ecef_vel);
00221 #ifdef USE_HFF
00222     VECT2_ASSIGN(ins_gps_pos_m_ned, ins_gps_pos_cm_ned.x, ins_gps_pos_cm_ned.y);
00223     VECT2_SDIV(ins_gps_pos_m_ned, ins_gps_pos_m_ned, 100.);
00224     VECT2_ASSIGN(ins_gps_speed_m_s_ned, ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned.x, ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned.y);
00225     VECT2_SDIV(ins_gps_speed_m_s_ned, ins_gps_speed_m_s_ned, 100.);
00226     if (ins_hf_realign) {
00227       ins_hf_realign = FALSE;
00228 #ifdef SITL
00229       struct FloatVect2 true_pos, true_speed;
00230       VECT2_COPY(true_pos, fdm.ltpprz_pos);
00231       VECT2_COPY(true_speed, fdm.ltpprz_ecef_vel);
00232       b2_hff_realign(true_pos, true_speed);
00233 #else
00234       const struct FloatVect2 zero = {0.0, 0.0};
00235       b2_hff_realign(ins_gps_pos_m_ned, zero);
00236 #endif
00237     }
00238     b2_hff_update_gps();
00239 #ifndef USE_VFF /* vff not used */
00240     ins_ltp_pos.z =  (ins_gps_pos_cm_ned.z * INT32_POS_OF_CM_NUM) / INT32_POS_OF_CM_DEN;
00241     ins_ltp_speed.z =  (ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned.z * INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_NUM) INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_DEN;
00242 #endif /* vff not used */
00243 #endif /* hff used */
00244 
00245 
00246 #ifndef USE_HFF /* hff not used */
00247 #ifndef USE_VFF /* neither hf nor vf used */
00248     INT32_VECT3_SCALE_3(ins_ltp_pos, ins_gps_pos_cm_ned, INT32_POS_OF_CM_NUM, INT32_POS_OF_CM_DEN);
00249     INT32_VECT3_SCALE_3(ins_ltp_speed, ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned, INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_NUM, INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_DEN);
00250 #else /* only vff used */
00251     INT32_VECT2_SCALE_2(ins_ltp_pos, ins_gps_pos_cm_ned, INT32_POS_OF_CM_NUM, INT32_POS_OF_CM_DEN);
00252     INT32_VECT2_SCALE_2(ins_ltp_speed, ins_gps_speed_cm_s_ned, INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_NUM, INT32_SPEED_OF_CM_S_DEN);
00253 #endif
00254 
00255 #ifdef USE_GPS_LAG_HACK
00256     VECT2_COPY(d_pos, ins_ltp_speed);
00257     INT32_VECT2_RSHIFT(d_pos, d_pos, 11);
00258     VECT2_ADD(ins_ltp_pos, d_pos);
00259 #endif
00260 #endif /* hff not used */
00261 
00262     INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_pos, ins_ltp_pos);
00263     INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_speed, ins_ltp_speed);
00264     INT32_VECT3_ENU_OF_NED(ins_enu_accel, ins_ltp_accel);
00265   }
00266 #endif /* USE_GPS */
00267 }
00268 
00269 void ins_update_sonar() {
00270 #if defined USE_SONAR && defined USE_VFF
00271   static int32_t sonar_filtered = 0;
00272   sonar_filtered = (sonar_meas + 2*sonar_filtered) / 3;
00273   /* update baro_qfe assuming a flat ground */
00274   if (ins_update_on_agl && baro.status == BS_RUNNING) {
00275     int32_t d_sonar = (((int32_t)sonar_filtered - ins_sonar_offset) * INS_SONAR_SENS_NUM) / INS_SONAR_SENS_DEN;
00276     ins_qfe = baro.absolute + (d_sonar * (INS_BARO_SENS_DEN))/INS_BARO_SENS_NUM;
00277   }
00278 #endif
00279 }
